description: '''Dez Cadena''' (born June 2, 1961) is an American [[punk rock]] singer and guitarist. He was the third vocalist and later rhythm guitarist for [[hardcore punk]] band [[Black Flag (band)|Black Flag]] from 1980 to 1983. Cadena played guitar with [[Misfits (band)|Misfits]] from 2001 to 2015, initially joining the band alongside [[Doyle Wolfgang von Frankenstein|Doyle]], [[Jerry Only]], and [[Robo (musician)|Robo]] for their 25th Anniversary Tour.
